modName: All soul gems can trap humanoid souls
summary: Enables petty/lesser/common/greater/grand soul gems to trap humanoid souls.
descriptionHtml:
[size=+3]This mod is [color=red]no longer supported[/color], all of its functions have been migrated to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54415]Soul Trap Redone[/url][/size]

[size=+1]
Tired of running in the wild trying to find animals of appropriate levels to fill your soul gems?
Then this mod is for you.

[color=red]What this mod does:[/color]
Let you fill your empty petty/lesser/common/greater/grand soul gems by killing humanoids.
An empty soul gem of any level in you inventory will be completely filled (i.e an empty common soul gem will be filled with a common soul. ) whenever a humanoid dies under the effect of your soul trap spell(also work for soul trap weapon enchantment).
Larger soul gems will be filled first. i.e When capturing a humanoid soul, if you have an empty greater gem and an empty lesser gem, the greater gem will be filled.

[color=red]What this mod does not do:[/color]
Change the Azura Star. (It can only trap non-humanoid souls.)
Change the way soul trap works on non-humanoid creatures.
Change the soul tear shout.

[color=red]Requirements:[/color]
None.

[color=red]Incompatibility:[/color]
This mod is NOT compatible with anything that changes the soul trap script.
I.e Acquisitive Soul Gems

[color=red]Installation:[/color]
Extract the files to your skyrim folder or use NMM

[color=red]Uninstallation: [/color]
Deactivate it in NMM and then Delete it.

[color=red]Update log:[/color]
V 1.0.3: Fixed a bug that caused the black star unable to trap humanoid souls.
V 1.0.2: Now the soul gem with the highest capacity will be filled first.
V 1.0.1: Fixed a bug that caused failure to capture the soul when killing a target in one hit with soul-trap enchanted weapons. Added author and mod description info. Changed the notification when successfully captured a soul to "Soul Captured".
V 1.0 : Initial release

[color=red]My other Mods:[/color]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54339/]Merchants instantly restock items and gold[/url]
[/size]
author: hc65535
